TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellValueEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理和事件以在控件中实现虚拟模式。Handle the and events to implement virtual mode in the control. 有关虚拟模式的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件, 以在数据存储对象中存储更新和新条目。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 此示例是参考主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

related.span: Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式

span.span: Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，此值指示发生此事件的单元格的列索引。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the column index of the cell that the event occurs for.

value.span: 列的索引，该列包含发生此事件的单元格。

span.span: The index of the column containing the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此偏移量与属性一起使用, 以引用发生此事件的单元格。Use this offset with the property to reference the cell that the event occurs for. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性从数据存储中检索单元值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve cell values from the data store. 此示例是在[如何:在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中实现虚拟模式。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#120)]

summary.span: 获取或设置发生此事件的单元格的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the cell that the event occurs for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当处理事件时, 可以使用此属性检查单元格的值, 或者在创建事件时, 将此属性用于传递单元的当前值。Use this property to inspect the cell's value when handling an event, or to communicate the cell's current value if creating an event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件, 以在数据存储对象中存储更新和新条目。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 此示例是参考主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]
